/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall buildings, their facades painted in shades of brown and gray, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. The buildings are adorned with numerous windows, hinting at the bustling life within. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. In the foreground, trees and bushes add a touch of greenery, softening the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, enhancing the colors and bringing the scene to life.
